ConnectionType.description: Required. Specifies the Cloud provider of the connection. The only valid value is AwsPrivateLink.

Description.description: Required. A description of the connection. Maximum of 255 characters.

DeveloperName.description: The developerâ€™s internal name for the inbound network connection used in the API.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated type in Metadata API.Query this field only if the query result contains no more than one record. Otherwise, an error is returned. If more than one record exists, use multiple queries to retrieve the records. This limit protects performance.

isActive.description: Required. Specifies whether the connection is active (true) or not(false). The default value is false

Language.description: The language of the connection. The value for this field is the language value of the org.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

MasterLabel.description: The internal label for the connection.

Metadata.description: Provides access to the associated type and related fields in Metadata API.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the connection. An inbound network connection can be in an extension namespace different than the object.

Status.description: Required. Connection status. The connection is initially Unprovisioned and moves through the other states automatically after an admin performs a provision, sync, or teardown action. The valid values are: Unprovisioned Allocating PendingAcceptance PendingActivation RejectedRemotely DeletedRemotely TeardownInProgress Ready
